code: import moment from'moment';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatDate=_ref=>{let{date}=_ref;const isCurrentDay=moment(date,'DD-MM-YYYY').isSame(moment(),'day');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-date","data-date":isCurrentDay?'Today':moment(date,'DD-MM-YYYY').format('D MMM')});};export default ChatDate;
